title: Ep 8. - Slasher Movies
description:
On today's episode, the guys cover people bleeding out of their orifices on a Mumbai airline, a romantic suspense novelist famous for writing a blog titled, "How to Murder Your Husband," being accused of murder, a Russian town going overboard with voodoo dolls, and a 12 year-old in Michigan stealing a police cruiser and taking it for a joyride. Todd also wants to know what kind of movies the guys would create if they were trying to create the next big slasher film franchise, they do a little fact or fiction, answer some listener questions, and close out with a few vitamin thoughts. It's a good time, come join us.

This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @VivalaZito, @evanfoxy, and closes out with the Russell Brand/Infant Sorrow song "Inside of You."
dc:creator: The Pod
